sentences.en: ...the semiannual meeting of the International Monetary Fund.
sentences.cn: ...一年两次的国际货币基金组织会议。

sentences.en: Both make semiannual invest payments called coupon payments.
sentences.cn: 每半年一次的投资支付称为息票.

sentences.en: Receipt of semiannual interest on $ 5 at 8 %.
sentences.cn: 收到面值5美元,年息8%的债券的半年利息.

sentences.en: Two months later, on March 1, a semiannual interest payment is made to bondholders.
sentences.cn: 在两个月之后的3月1日, 给债券持有者支付半年的利息.

words.tran_cn: 五十周年纪念的；五十年一度的
五十周年；五十周年纪念
一年两次的；半年一次的

trans.tran_en: A semiannual event happens twice a year
